messages.content: I'm writing to tell you more about me and why I'm standing to be your MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for our local NHS and standing up for the carers.
Ensuring fair rents and building the affordable homes we need.

issues.economy: I used to work at the and fight cases of tax evasion and abuses of power by multinational companies.
issues.education: I believe every child deserves to go to an outstanding state school.
issues.health: My campaigns have led me to Parliament to fight for resources for our local NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: I worked for , where I campaigned for the introduction of the living wage and the expansion of free school meals.

housing.content: I will fight to tackle the housing crisis, making sure that the right homes are built in the right places.

leaflet.personalStatement: I love our area. It's where I live. It's where I met my wife, Emma, and where we are raising our two young children.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought for resources for our local NHS, community police officers and campaigns for school funding.

endorsements.endorsement: Will is a dedicated local campaigner with a great track record.
